item.title: Thank You for Downloading I2P
item.description:
Thank You for Downloading I2P!

Your download has started. If it doesn’t begin automatically, please check your downloads folder or return to the downloads page .

Next Steps

Now that you have I2P, here’s how to get started:

  1. Install I2P - Follow our installation guides for your platform
  2. Configure Your Browser - Set up your browser to use I2P with our browser configuration guide
  3. Explore I2P Sites - Start browsing .i2p sites and discover the I2P network
  4. Get Support - Join our community forums or IRC channels if you need help

ðŸ’œ Support I2P Development

I2P is a free, open-source project built and maintained by volunteers around the world. We have no corporate backing, venture capital, or advertising. We depend entirely on community support to keep the network running and growing.
